Entry.JapaneseText: おれや<Veigue>は、すぐにわかる長髪だけど、 <Eugene>も長いんだよな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's plain to see that <Veigue> and I have long hair, but yours is pretty long too, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……十五年前、<Blue>王の盾<White>の隊長に なった時に伸ばし始めたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I started growing it out fifteen years ago when I became commander of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、年季入ってんなぁ！ <Mao>が生まれる前からか……くぅー！
Entry.EnglishText: Ohh, that's a long time! Before <Mao> was even born... Sheeesh!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……そういう事になるな。 とはいえ、ふた月に一度は手入れしている。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, something like that. Although I do get it trimmed once every two months.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう、ボクが時々 チョキチョキしてるんだヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep yep, every once in a while I have to give it the old snip-snip!
